definition: A decorative element or embellishment added to enhance the appearance or aesthetic appeal of something, often used in the context of art, design, or music. It is commonly employed to adorn various objects, such as furniture, clothing, or musical instruments, with intricate patterns, motifs, or details.

examples.german: Die Verzierung des Kuchens war wunderschön.
examples.english: The decoration on the cake was beautiful.

examples.german: Sie hat die Verzierung des Weihnachtsbaums gemacht.
examples.english: She did the ornamentation of the Christmas tree.

examples.german: Die Verzierung auf dem Kleid war sehr detailliert.
examples.english: The embellishment on the dress was very detailed.

examples.german: Er hat die Verzierung auf dem Möbelstück selbst gemacht.
examples.english: He made the ornamentation on the furniture himself.

examples.german: Die Verzierung des Buches war aufwendig gestaltet.
examples.english: The decoration of the book was elaborately designed.
